Input:Budget.title: Budget
Input:Budget.description: a number or currency, given by the user, to determine the maximum budget of the property

Input:OppType.title: OppType
Input:OppType.description: a text input by the user to determine if user would like to rent or buy the property

Input:SearchKey.title: Search Key
Input:SearchKey.description: a text input by the user to determine what kind of property they're looking for

Input:Location.title: Location
Input:Location.description: a text input by the user to determine which location of the property they're looking for
